title: Introduction to Desalination and Water Challenges in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of desalination?
choices: To increase salt content in water
To remove salt and minerals from seawater or brackish water
To purify air in coastal regions
questions.answer: To remove salt and minerals from seawater or brackish water

choices: Men are primarily responsible for water collection

Women and children often bear the burden of collecting water

choices: It has no impact on education

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of customary laws regarding water in Timorese communities?
choices: To govern water use and distribution
To prohibit water use during dry seasons
questions.answer: To govern water use and distribution

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the seasonal variability of water resources in Timor-Leste?
choices: Consistent water availability throughout the year
Periods of water abundance followed by severe shortages
Constant water scarcity regardless of season
questions.answer: Periods of water abundance followed by severe shortages

questions.question: What is a potential social impact of implementing desalination technology in Timor-Leste?
choices: Reduced dependence on traditional water sources
Elimination of all water-related cultural practices

questions.question: How might climate change affect the need for desalination in Timor-Leste?
choices: It will eliminate the need for desalination
It may increase the need due to more frequent droughts
It will have no impact on water resources
It will increase freshwater availability, reducing desalination needs
questions.answer: It may increase the need due to more frequent droughts

choices: Ignoring cultural significance of water sources

questions.answer: Respecting and incorporating local knowledge and customs
